name: .ROU File Extension
summary: Learn about .ROU files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Contains routing data used in printed circuit board (PCB) manufacturing; saved in a standard Gerber format and includes plating and count information about the drilling tools used to create the board.

content: NOTE: The primary PCB design and manufacturing data is stored in a .GBR file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
